titleStmt.title: To all friends everywhere to whom this may concern, to go abroad among them to be read in the fear of God by them
titleStmt.author: Livingstone, Patrick, 1634?-1694.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Your friend Patrick Livingstone. From the prison in Newgate the 7th. of the 10th month 1670.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
